infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: BOCM uses the camera so you can take photos and record videos for your profile and portfolio.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: BOCM accesses your photo library so you can select photos and videos for your profile and portfolio.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: BOCM uses your location to show nearby beauty professionals and improve local search results.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: BOCM uses the microphone to record audio when you record videos for your portfolio.

plugins.photosPermission: BOCM needs access to your photos and videos so you can upload profile pictures and portfolio content.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow BOCM to use your location to show nearby beauty professionals and improve local search results.
